SEARCH

Package controller

package controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BaseController
    The BaseController class is the base class for all controllers in the system.
    CoordinatorController
    A class that serves as a Controller for the CoordinatorBoundary class.
    ProjectController
    The ProjectController class manages the creation, modification, and retrieval of Project objects, as well as the assignment of projects to students and supervisors.
    RequestController
    A class that serves as a controller for managing requests.
    StudentController
    Student's controller to process inputs obtained from the Student's Boundary.
    SupervisorController
    The SupervisorController class is a subclass of UserController that handles supervisor-specific functionalities.
    UserController
    The UserController class is responsible for managing the logic of all users in the system and handling user-related functionality.
